item.title: Ansible Reference
item.description: Ansible check disk - name: Ensure that free space on {{ mountname }} is grater than 40% assert: that: mount.size_available > mount.size_total|float * 0.4 msg: disk space has reached 60% threshold vars: mountname: '/' mount: "{{ ansible_mounts | selectattr('mount','equalto',mountname) | list | first }}" atau - name: Ensure that free space on the tested volume is greater than 15% assert: that: - mount.size_available > mount.size_total|float * 0.15 msg: Disk space has reached 85% threshold vars: mount: "{{ ansible_mounts | selectattr('mount','equalto',item.
